content.question: A recent newspaper article claimed that more people read Magazine A than read Magazine B. To test the claim, a study was conducted by a publishing representative in which newsstand operators were selected at random and asked how many of each magazine were sold that day. The representative will conduct a hypothesis test to test whether the mean number of magazines of type A the operators sell, <math alttext="mu sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, is greater than the mean number of magazines of type B the operators sell, <math alttext="mu sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. What are the correct null and alternative hypotheses for the test?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub B equals 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub B is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub B is less than 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub B is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub B equals 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub B is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: x bar sub A minus x bar sub B equals 0. H sub a: x bar sub A minus x bar sub B is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub B minus mu sub A equals 0. H sub a: mu sub B minus mu sub A is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub B equals 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub B is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.8: Setting Up a Test for the Difference of Two Population Means

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
